citation_details.title: Effect of Obesity on Arithmetic Processing in Preteens With High and Low Math Skills: An Event-Related Potentials Study
citation_details.author: GC Alatorre-Cruz, H Downs, D Hagood
citation_details.abstract: Preadolescence is an important period for the consolidation of certain arithmetic facts, and  the development of problem-solving strategies. Obese subjects seem to have poorer
citation_details.short_author: GC Alatorre-Cruz, H Downs, D Hagood
